text: om, chronic, serous, simple or unspecified
context: preoperative diagnoses: om, chronic, serous, simple or unspecified.
serous fluid was aspirated from the middle ear space.
cortisporin suspension was placed in both ear canals.
the adenoids were removed using the microdebrider.
all bleeders were cauterized as they were encountered.
both tonsil beds were then re-cauterized, paying particular attention to the inferior and superior poles.
the stomach was evacuated with the nasogastric tube.
